Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37464 affecting package cjose for versions less than 0.6.2.2-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-37464 affecting package cjose for versions less than 0.6.2.2-7. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cjose is earlier than 0.6.2.2-7, affected by CVE-2023-37464
